blog.name: jcinkgalore
blog.title: jcink galore
blog.description: jcink galore is a jcink resource tumblr for roleplay advertising and player interaction. we feature an advertising base, as well as a way to build community between jcink roleplayers. we only accept jcink hosted sites.

summary: you wear a different face to each atrocity. you are un-unified and tangled. are you just gluttony? are you civilization’s slow...
caption:
you wear a different face to each atrocity.
you are un-unified and tangled.
are you just gluttony?
are you civilization’s slow grenade?

halys is a member-driven au marauders jcink site, set in mid-1980 at the height of the first wizarding war.

title: look it’s more
body:
(there is a cut)

Harry looked around, waiting and watching. He was late. Only two minutes, but still late.

“Harry! I’m so sorry, I got caught up talking to Pansy and Blaise about the issue of house elf rights. Granger’s mentality has really rubbed off on me…” Draco ran down the corridor, meeting Harry.

Harry shrugged. “It’s fine.” He smiled softly at Draco.  

Draco smiled back, leaning closer and pinning Harry against the wall, bracing his hands beside Harry’s head. He leaned in even closer and gently kissed Harry, revelling in the feeling of Harry gripping his hips and pulling him closer. “Eager, much?” Draco laughed, feeling Harry’s breath on his face.

Harry stretched up and met Draco’s lips with his own again, gripping one of Draco’s wrists and gently tugging it off the wall and down, under his shirt. Harry felt Draco gently stroking his stomach, tracing patterns with his cold fingers.

“WHAT THE HELL? HARRY!” Ron shouted, mortified look on his face.

Draco’s head whipped towards Ron, freezing.

Harry slowly turned his head towards Ron too, wincing as he did. “I can explain…” he muttered, feeling a hot blush creeping up his cheeks.

“At least I know where you’ve been at all those lunch breaks when you disappeared…” Ron sighed, shaking his head.

Harry shrugged with one shoulder, gently tugging Draco’s hand out from under his shirt, hissing when Draco turned back to him and dragged his fingers over the patch of skin just above his waistband.

Ron averted his eyes, turning back the way he came and leaving. “I feel like this is some sort of fever dream or something…” he muttered as he left, shaking his head.

Harry scowled at Draco. “I thought you said no one followed you!” Harry mumbled, embarrassed.

“I didn’t see him! I don’t think I’m going to be able to look him in the eye for months…” Draco sighed.

Harry tried not to laugh but failed miserably. He burst out laughing, collapsing backwards onto the wall. “Me neither,” he cackled.

Draco shook his head, a smile stretching across his face. “You know… he’s going to tell everyone. Your reputation is going to die,” he whispered, smile vanishing.

“I don’t care. I think you ought to know this: you are worth it. You are worth every second of stupid publicity I’m about to unwillingly receive, and worth every person hates me. I don’t care what anyone else other than you think. If you think I’m going to leave you because my unwanted publicity is about to all but disappear, you’re seriously incorrect.” Harry pushed forwards off the wall, wrapping his arms around Draco’s waist and resting his head against Draco’s chest.

Draco smiled softly. “I love you,” he blurted.

“I know. And I love you too.” Harry lifted his head from Draco’s chest and stretched up to kiss him gently.

“WHAT? I DIDN’T THINK YOU WERE TELLING THE TRUTH, RONALD!” Hermione shouted, eyes wide.

“Oh, he was telling the truth alright, Granger.” Draco laughed, wrapping his arms around Harry, pulling him in close. “The Saviour’s all mine, now.”

“Oi! Quit it! I told you to call me Harry or nothing at all!” Harry whacked Draco on the arm.

Draco laughed again. “Alright, nothing at all.”

“No…” Harry sighed, relaxing into Draco’s hold. “That’s really not what I meant and you know it.”

“That, I do.”

//

i hope you like it :D

summary: Harry Hermione Severus Luna Fleur Hedwig Dumbledore
question: Harry Hermione Severus Luna Fleur Hedwig Dumbledore
answer:
Harry - Explain a scar on your body

I have a barely visible scar on my elbow because when I was a kid I fell off my bike

Hermione - a subject you know a lot about

Probably Italian literature

Severus - your favorite alcoholic beverage

I don’t like much alcoholic beverages, the only alcoholic thing I drink is beer

Fleur - What physical attribute do you like the most about your yourself

My hair, but only when it is decent ahah

Hedwig - what is your all-time favorite pet or if you have never had one your all-time favorite birthday gift

My all-time favorite birthday gift is probably the necklace with my name initial my mom bought me, I always wear it

Dumbledore - what is your proudest accomplishment

It’s for sure my driving license, I would have never thought of getting it lol

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: Harry has a delightful one night stand with a handsome stranger, before going back to his normal life. Except his life...
body: Prompt: Harry has a delightful one night stand with a handsome stranger, before going back to his normal life. Except his life is a little less normal now, because now it seems like he has gained a stalker. One who was quite happy to give Harry little gifts, but apparently has no problem hurting people who flirt with Harry. He signs all his notes as Voldemort…

blog.name: hogwartshousefriends
blog.title: Hogwarts House Friends
blog.description: Greetings babes. I’m Anastasia. I have a special place in my heart for both Shakespeare and Harry Potter. Icon by @risuniku. If you need something tagged that I don't already tag let me know and I will do so.

summary:
Hufflepuff: So you’re lying.
Ravenclaw: No... actually I’m standing, with great posture, might I add, I mean you could probably...
body:
Hufflepuff: So you’re lying.

Ravenclaw: No… actually I’m standing, with great posture, might I add, I mean you could probably balance a stack of books on my head if you wanted-

Hufflepuff: Jesus Christ that’s not what I meant and you know it.

summary: Hi can you do 41 or 59 for drarry please ? 💖
question: Hi can you do 41 or 59 for drarry please ? 💖
answer:
Number 59, “I could punch you right now.”

It got longer and angstier than I thought it would, but it ends well, don’t worry.

There is a cut.

***

Harry was acting oddly. Draco was pretty sure he wasavoiding him. Not an easy feat as they had been living together for half ayear.

Draco didn’t like it.

He told himself that every relationship hit their roughpatch some time. He just had to give Harry his space to figure out whatever itwas that was bothering him. But fuck, it hurt. Everytime Harry avoided hisgaze, everytie he changed the subject when Draco asked what was wrong, Dracofelt like his heart was being ripped out of his chest.

He wanted to grab Harry, and shake him, ask him ‘What did Ido wrong? Why do you hate me?’

One night, Draco decided to put his French roots to use andcook dinner, a real dinner, a five course meal, something that would make Harryforgive him anything.

Only Harry was late, and as the soup grew cold in theirnicest china, so did Draco’s heart. Were they over? Would Harry leave, would hetake all that was his, the fridge, the curtains, Draco’s love and happiness.Would he at least tell him why?

By the time Harry came home, it was 11 PM and the candleshad metled out. Harry stared at the perfectly dressed table with consternation.

‘’I was at Ron’s,’’ he said, and Draco felt like he shouldcry. ‘’Did you make all of this because…’’ he paused, sounding hesitant. ‘’Wereyou going to propose?’’

Draco was definitely crying, with barely enough strengthleft in him to shake his head no.

‘’Oh, thank Merlin,’’ Harry sighed and Draco exploded.

‘’What is that supposed to mean, Harry? Have I grown sorepulsive to you that the thought of me wanting to be married to you provokessuch… contempt?’’ He was sobbing so hard he had trouble breathing.

Suddenly, Harry was there, craddling his face, wiping awayhis tears with his thumbs.

‘’Oh, Love, of course not, how could you think such a thing?’’

‘’You’ve barely looked at me in a week.’’

Harry looked startled and slowly pulled something out of hispocket.

‘’Draco. I was hoping you wouldn’t propose because I wasplanning on doing it first. Look.’’

Draco couldn’t understand the words, couldn’t understand thesilver ring in Harry’s palm.

‘’I was trying to keep it a secret. I thought you could readit all over my face, I was so excited. I didn’t think you could ever believethat I hated you.’’

‘’I could punch you, right now,’’ Draco confessed, hisfeelings all confused.

‘’Is that a yes?’’, Harry asked, sounding almost scared.

‘’Of course it’s a yes, you idiot.’’

Harry laughed, sliding the ring up Draco’s finger.

‘’I guess the proposing party on Saturday can easily beturned into an engagement party,’’ he said.

Draco really wanted to punch Harry, but he kissed himinstead.

blog.name: rebellionofthecattle
blog.title: Corvus' cavern
blog.description: Fandoms, headcanons and nonsense. All my ships are RarePairs. My creative blog is @RebellionOfTheRams

body:
Dark!HarryPotter

I absolutely love Dark!Harry AUs. They’re interesting and intriguing if written right. But, they’re not the best. Why’s it always Harry and the trio?

I want Dark!Neville: a boy who grew up with magic and almost thought he was a squib. So, when he gets to Hogwarts, he throws himself into magic. When he just can’t get it right, the magic he wanted his entire life, he pours through the library. After reading about squibs and magical disorders, he found what he needed - wands. His was his father’s, not his, and, when he got his own, he was incredible. But, it wasn’t enough. His anger at those who hurt his family pushed him to learn what could best them - dark magic. The first blood drawn was from anyone who dared speak of his parents. His true target: Bellatrix Lestrange.

I want Dark!Luna: the school freak that no-one approaches. You’ve got a lot of time on your hands when no-one give you the time of day. She spends her time with animals and learns how to tame them as well as how to ease them into her will. Students approach her for tutoring and leave with the unease of a silent terror. She never spills blood. Her strategies and plans - nothing but games to her - leave people isolated and shattered in less than a week. Imperio is there for her when all else fails and her enemies would never know the mercy of death by someone else’s hand.

I want Dark!Twins: the Weasleys that were never the smartest or the most interesting and were raised in shadows. They learnt to get attention from those above them by acting out and playing fools but it always faded away. Their intelligence couldn’t be forced into lessons and the attention given to their tricks got more difficult to maintain. Each time that their pranks got bigger, so did the limelight they craved. But, they were never the favourite. So, they turned to what they had left: dark magic. They became known by the legends of their enemies; by the fire in their eyes; by the whistle of fireworks.

I want Dark!AU characters who were wronged and bitter and found a way to thrive in the shadows.

body:
In the Department of Mysteries

Luna: Expecto Patronum


Harry: Luna that spell is for dementors


Luna: they look like dementors


Neville: Let her Harry, we could all use some happiness sometimes


Luna ‘trash talking’ deaths eaters and Neville being all sweet.

tags: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
summary: i started reading hp in 2015 and sort of took my time and well, i finished ‘the deathly hallows’ last night and it’s given me...
caption:
i started reading hp in 2015 and sort of took my time and well, i finished ‘the deathly hallows’ last night and it’s given me the worst book hangover :(
my thoughts are all over the place but i couldn’t believe there was more to voldemort and dumbledore than i thought????? this is where i say, the book is always better than the movie. truly. if you haven’t read the books yet, just know you’re in for a treat.

Harry : *falls down the stairs, spilling his cereal everywhere*
Ron : Natural selection is coming for this specimen.

summary: What do you do when you want the merch but can't afford the merch? You DIY the merch!  I've always had a thing for those little...
caption:
What do you do when you want the merch but can’t afford the merch? You DIY the merch!

I’ve always had a thing for those little objects and trinkets that make fictional worlds feel ever so slightly more real. And since I’m a huge Harry Potter fan (and an actual child in the body of a seemingly responsible adult), I’ve always wanted a Hogwarts ID card. I came across Muggle Magic’s Youtube channel and video on how to make one - plus templates because, let’s be real: sometimes we don’t feel like designing all of the DIY stuff ourselves. Since I’m too old to actually attend Hogwarts, I turned my card into an Alumnus Club member card - I’m convinced Hogwarts has one. I’ve also laminated my card since I’m infamous for spilling things on my stuff. The card holder itself would make a pretty cool business card holder, or even a nice gift envelope for a dainty necklace or something of the like.

(The tiny Time Turner is by Primark.)

summary:
Harry : You’re the man who made me into the man I am today
Sirius : You can’t blame me for that.
body:
Harry : You’re the man who made me into the man I am today
Sirius : You can’t blame me for that.

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry :
dialogue.phrase: You’re the man who made me into the man I am today

dialogue.name: Sirius
dialogue.label: Sirius :
dialogue.phrase: You can’t blame me for that.
